svg.title: Complete Underwriting Workflow â€” 15 Phases + Context Brief + Phase 6A
svg.desc: Full underwriting journey showing all phases from Operator Context Brief through Due Diligence & Closing, aligned to the Canonical Workflow Resequencing (Feb 2026). Includes blocking gates, conditional branches, half-step 6A, skill counts, time estimates, and segment brackets.
svg.text: CANONICAL SEQUENCE — OPERATOR CONTEXT BRIEF THROUGH DUE DILIGENCE & CLOSING

g.text: Planning, deal parameters, nuance classification, scope — sets deal framing
Scan, classify, DD checklist — organizes docs, NO Deal Book yet
HARD RULE: APIs fire first (FRED, Census, MCP), THEN Deal Book created with verified data
GATE — if NO-GO, workflow stops | 30+ page DOCX
MSA data, supply pipeline, demand drivers, submarket | 30+ page DOCX
In-place rents, unit mix, occupancy, lease terms | 15+ page DOCX | MUST execute BEFORE Lender Rent
Rent comps, sales comps, market context | 30+ page DOCX | Feeds directly into 6A
CRITICAL GATE — requires Phase 4 (market) + 5 (rent roll) + 6 (comps) complete
GATE — T-12 cleaning, standardization, line-item benchmarking | 15+ page DOCX
Conditional — value-add / lease-up renovation & capex assessment; stabilized → skip
Conditional — quality checkpoint after analytical block (5-8), before cash flow synthesis
THE synthesis step — Phase 6A (lender rent) + Phase 7 (expenses) + Phase 8 (capex) | Dual scenario
Appraisal, PCA, Phase I ESA, engineering reports, valuation reconciliation
GATE — Lender Sizer (loan_sizer.py) fires FIRST, then structuring consumes output
Carries sensitivity from Phase 12 — stress tests, risk rating, levered/unlevered returns
20+ page capstone IC memorandum referencing all prior analysis documents
DD package, third-party reports, settlement, funding authorization
● GATE (blocking) ○ Conditional (dashed) ● Half-step (6A) ● Standard flow 17 phases | 4 gates | 2 conditional
